data.name: EmailSendException
data.value: Couldn't send a message to your email.

data.name: DefaultException
data.value: An error occurred while processing the request.

data.name: ExternalLoginException
data.value: Authentication error using an external provider

data.name: LoginAlreadyAssociatedException
data.value: The login is already linked to another user

data.name: OldPasswordNeededException
data.value: The old password is not specified

data.name: EmailAlreadyTakenException
data.value: The mail is already in use

data.name: UserLockoutException
data.value: You have been blocked due to a large number of failed login attempts. Try logging in later

data.name: UserNameFormatException
data.value: The username has an incorrect format

data.name: UserNameLengthException
data.value: The length of the user name should not be from 3 to 20 characters
